# init(rawValue:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new instance with the specified raw value.

## Declaration

```swift
init(rawValue: String)
```

## Font size category creation

- **init(_:)**: Creates a content size category from the specified SwiftUI content size category.
- **init(_:)**: Creates a content size category from the specified SwiftUI Dynamic Type size.
